description: This image captures a charming scene of a small, vibrant orange robin perched on a black metal bar, with a textured stone wall in the background. The bird's bright plumage stands out against the muted colors of the surroundings, highlighting its presence in an urban setting. The setting includes a warning sign on a nearby electronic device, adding a touch of modernity to the natural scene.
poem:
A robin on metal, so bold and so bright,
In the city's embrace, under soft daylight.
With feathers of orange, so vivid and neat,
Amidst the stone walls, its chirp is so sweet.
In the urban jungle, a tranquil retreat.
